full_summary:
### Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

**Contract Reference:** W8485-247780/A
**Publication Date:** 15th August 2023
**Closure Date:** 31st August 2023 at 14:00 hrs

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of 4 Mini Move Out/Jump Off mobile racks (Mini MOJO) to support rapid Link 16 Small Tactical Terminal (STT) radio capability as requested by the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF). The requirement is as follows:

* **Product Description:** Move Out/Jump Off (MOJO) Mini system / TERMINAL, SATELLITE COMMUNICATION
* **National Stock Number:** 5895-01-691-6505
* **Part Number:** 1232068
* **NCAGE:** 47358 VIASAT INC

**Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) Details:**

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
* **Recipient Entity:** Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF)
* **Estimated Contract Start Date:** 01st September 2023
* **Estimated Contract End Date:** 31st March 2024

**Statement of Capabilities:**

The Department of National Defence invites qualified suppliers to submit a Statement of Capabilities, outlining their qualifications and ability to deliver the required product. Statements of capabilities must be received by 31st August 2023, at 14:00 hrs.

**Inquiries and Statements of Capabilities:**

All inquiries and statements of capabilities must be directed to:

Capt Kyle Grenier
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 1K2
Email: [Kyle.Grenier@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Kyle.Grenier@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (819) 939-7031

**Attachments:**

A copy of the Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) can be downloaded from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
A French version of the ACAN is also available at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Notes:**

A timely response to this Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) will significantly improve the chances of a successful response. The Department of National
